about_the_game:
《Tank Arena:Total Operation》 is a MMO competitive military war game. Players command more than 400 different types of tanks, armored vehicles or helicopters on a 2000x2000 massive battlefield and engage in 12v12 team-based battles against other players from all over the world. Travel across the historical battlefield, immerse yourself in the clash between tanks, collision of team strategies and adrenaline-pumping PVP fights. You will enjoy the unique fun brought by strategies and teamwork.




###Train Your Tanks: Create Your Own War Machine


In Tank Arena:Total Operation, tanks are not only your weapons, but also your partners on the battlefield. The game provides historically famous tanks from many countries, such as the German Tiger II , the Soviet T-34, the United States' M4 Sherman, etc. Each tank has its unique performance and fighting style. You can gradually improve the tank's armor, defense, firepower and mobility through the upgrade system to create a steel behemoth that suits your own tactical needs.




###The Ranking Contest: Challenge Top-notch Commanders 


For players who are eager to prove themselves, the Ranking Contest is not to be missed. In the Ranking Contest, players are matched globally based on their performance, which allows them to compete head-on with elite commanders from all over the world. Through outstanding performance in the contest, players can gradually improve the ranking and unlock exclusive rewards. The ranking contest not only tests individual operation, but also requires keen judgment of the situation on the battlefield and tacit cooperation in a team. Every victory will add to your fame while failure turns into valuable experience to improve your tactics.




###Custom Appearance: Show Your Style and Glory 


In Tank Arena:Total Operation, every commander can be unique on the battlefield. The game offers various customization options. Players can add paintings, decals and accessories to their tanks, or even make a customized unique flag. On the battlefield, your tank is not only a war machine, but also a symbol of your personal style and glory.




### Teaming Strategies: Teamwork - the Key to Success


In Tank Arena:Total Operation, heroic individualism is important, but victory often goes to those who understand teamwork. There are a variety of PVP modes in the game. Whether it is in a 5v5 small-scale battle, or a 12v12 large-scale team battle, the successful execution of each tactic such as a frontal assault, a flank attack or a bypass attack, depends on the tacit understanding and cooperation between teammates. In battle, you need to keep an eye on your teammates, adjust your strategy and fight with the team for the victory.




### Real Battlefields: Immerse Yourself in the Grand Wars of WWII


Tank Arena:Total Operation takes you back to the battlefield of WWII with its exquisite visuals and perfectly reproduced battle scenes. Each map is designed based on the real battlefield of WWII. From the cold snowfields of the Eastern Front to the ruins of street battles of the Western Front, every detail allows you to immerse yourself in the real history. Combined with realistic sound effects and environmental interactions, you will feel the most realistic battle ambience here.
